message.raw:
Adding initial sphinx auto-doc pages.

This is an experiment with Sphinx.  Right now it does auto-documentation of the legendre transform routines in Ben's fork, and also includes some notes on using restructured text, sphinx, and our Trestle and Mac install notes.  This is a first rough cut, but it looks very promising.

--Ben Brown, 1/7/14
